'''Horn of Gondor''' is a [[:Category:Fan films|fan film]] based on [[Cirion and Eorl and the Friendship of Gondor and Rohan|a short story]] in ''[[Unfinished Tales]]''. The film was made available on YouTube on [[18 September]] [[2020]].

==Synopsis==
After the invasion of the fierce hordes of [[Balchoth]], [[Gondor]] is on the brink of destruction. The [[Ruling Steward]] [[Cirion]] places his hope on the half-forgotten nation of the Horselords in the north. Will the knight [[Borondir]] succeed and convey Cirion's message?
